title: Manchester City 'chase Dinamo Zagreb winger Antonio Marin'
text:
Manchester City are lining up a move for Dinamo Zagreb winger Antonio Marin according to Sky Sports.

The 18-year-old grabbed an assist in a 2-2 draw against City's U19 side last week.

The forward has two caps for Croatia's U21 side and has a contract at Dinamo until 2024.

Manchester City are reportedly lining up a move for Dinamo Zagreb winger Antonio Marin

Marin broke into the Dinamo first team last campaign and has played four times in the Croatian top flight.

Chelsea and Villarreal are also believed to be tracking one of Croatia's most exciting prospects.

City's first team beat Zagreb 2-0 in their Champions League group game.

Pep Guardiola's side have won their first two matches in the competition as they sit top of Group C with six points.

In the league, they fell eight points behind leaders Liverpool after losing 2-0 to Wolves on Sunday.
description: Manchester City are lining up a move for Dinamo Zagreb winger Antonio Marin according to Sky Sports. The 18-year-old grabbed an assist in a 2-2 draw against City's U19 side last week.
